# CourseraRdataVisualizationFinal

The goal of CourseraRdataVisualizationFinal is to provide a geom to draw hurricanes. It is the final assignment for the Coursera Data Visualization in R.

## Installation

You can install CourseraRdataVisualizationFinal from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("learner42/CourseraRdataVisualizationFinal")
```
